group.label: AppInlet TheCourierGuy

field.label: Active
field.comment: Method active?

field.label: Title
field.comment: Appears at checkout

field.label: Method Name
field.comment: Appears at checkout

field.label: Account number
field.comment: The account number supplied by The Courier Guy for integration purposes.

field.label: API Key
field.comment: Shiplogic API Key

field.label: Company Name
field.comment: The name of your company.

field.label: Shop Address 1
field.comment: The address used to calculate shipping, this is considered the collection point for the parcels being shipped.

field.label: Shop Address 2
field.comment: The address used to calculate shipping, this is considered the collection point for the parcels being shipped.

field.label: Zone
field.comment: Shop Zone

field.label: City
field.comment: Shop City

field.label: Postal Code
field.comment: Shop postal Code.

field.label: Telephone
field.comment: Shop Telephone Number.

field.label: Email
field.comment: Shop Email id.

field.label: Percentage Markup
field.comment: Shipping price percentage markup - will be added to shipping price at checkout.

field.label: Free Shipping If Grand Total is more than or equal to
field.comment: make shipping free if grand total is greater than or equal to

field.label: Typical Product Weight (in KG)
field.comment: For when the weight is not set on an individual product level

field.label: Typical Product Height (in CM)
field.comment: For when the height is not set on an individual product level

field.label: Typical Product Length (in CM)
field.comment: For when the length is not set on an individual product level

field.label: Typical Product Width (in CM)
field.comment: For when the width is not set on an individual product level

field.label: Length of Flyer
field.comment: Length of the Flyer

field.label: Width of Flyer
field.comment: Width of Flyer

field.label: Height of Flyer
field.comment: Height of Flyer

field.label: Length of Medium Parcel Size
field.comment: Length of Medium Parcel Size

field.label: Width of Medium Parcel Size
field.comment: Width of Medium Parcel Size

field.label: Height of Medium Parcel Size
field.comment: Height of Medium Parcel Size

field.label: Length of Large Parcel Size
field.comment: Length of Large Parcel Size

field.label: Width of Large Parcel Size
field.comment: Width of Large Parcel Size

field.label: Height of Large Parcel Size
field.comment: Height of Large Parcel Size

field.label: Enable flat rate cost to customer
field.comment: Enable flat rate cost to customer?

field.label: Flate Rate
field.comment: Flat Rate Cost To Customer

field.label: Disable TCG shipment on create shipment
Disable Boxes and Depot
field.comment: Disable Boxes and Depot Options?

field.label: Enable Custom Shipping Labels and Pricing
field.comment: Enable custom shipping labels for The Courier Guy?

group.label: The Courier Guy AIR: Fuel charge

field.comment: Set the custom label to be used for the shipping label

field.comment: Set the custom rate to be used for the shipping type
